/* Basic reset and styling */
body {
  margin: 0;
  font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
}

header {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  background-color: #333;
  color: #fff;
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  width: 100%;
  z-index: 1000;
}

#header-img {
  height: 50px;
}

#nav-bar {
  display: flex;
}

.nav-link {
  color: #fff;
  text-decoration: none;
  margin-left: 20px;
}

.nav-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

main {
  padding-top: 100px; 
}

#video {
  display: block;
  max-width: 100%;
  margin: 0 auto;
}

#form {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  margin: 20px auto;
}

#email {
  padding: 10px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}

#submit {
  padding: 10px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  cursor: pointer;
}

#form-section {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
}
/*gallery section*/
.gallery {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 16px;
  max-width: 1400px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 20px 10px;
}

.gallery img {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 350px;
  height: 300px;
  object-fit: cover;
  border-radius: 10px;
}

.gallery::after {
  content: "";
  width: 350px;
}


/* Media query for smaller screens */
@media (max-width: 600px) {
  #header {
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: flex-start;
  }

  #nav-bar {
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: flex-start;
  }

  .nav-link {
    margin: 10px 0;
  }

  #form {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 0 20px;
  }
}
